Menu.enterMessage: You stand at the entrance to Adventure, the legendary realm where brave souls seek treasure and glory. The path forward awaits your command, adventurer.
Menu.description: A mystical starting point where your epic journey begins. Ancient runes glow softly, hinting at the wonders that lie ahead.

Overworld.enterMessage: You emerge into the vast overworld of Adventure, a sprawling realm filled with mysteries, treasures, and dangerous creatures. The wind carries whispers of ancient secrets waiting to be discovered.
Overworld.description: An expansive wilderness dotted with castles, labyrinths, and hidden passages. Each step could lead to fortune or peril.

White Castle.enterMessage: The gleaming walls of the White Castle rise before you, their pristine stones radiating an aura of protection and hope. This sanctuary has sheltered many heroes on their quests.
White Castle.description: A majestic fortress of white stone, serving as a beacon of light in the realm.

Black Castle.enterMessage: Dark clouds swirl around the imposing Black Castle, its obsidian walls seeming to absorb light itself. An ominous presence emanates from within these cursed halls.
Black Castle.description: A foreboding stronghold shrouded in shadow and malevolent energy.

Yellow Castle.enterMessage: The Golden spires of the Yellow Castle catch the sunlight, creating a dazzling display of wealth and power. Rumors speak of great treasures hidden within its gilded chambers.
Yellow Castle.description: A castle of golden stone that gleams like the sun, promising riches beyond imagination.

Blue Labyrinth 0.checkMessage: You venture deep into the twisting passages of the Blue Labyrinth, your footsteps echoing off ancient stone walls. After careful exploration, you discover: {item}!
Blue Labyrinth 0.alreadyCheckedMessage: You've already thoroughly explored this section of the Blue Labyrinth. The corridors hold no more secrets for you.
Blue Labyrinth 0.inaccessibleMessage: The entrance to the Blue Labyrinth is sealed by mysterious blue energy that repels your approach.

Yellow Labyrinth 0.checkMessage: The Yellow Labyrinth's golden walls shimmer as you navigate its maze-like interior. Your persistence is rewarded when you find: {item}!
Yellow Labyrinth 0.alreadyCheckedMessage: This part of the Yellow Labyrinth has already yielded its treasures to you.
Yellow Labyrinth 0.inaccessibleMessage: Golden barriers block your path into the Yellow Labyrinth.

Black Labyrinth 0.checkMessage: Darkness seems to close in around you as you brave the Black Labyrinth's shadowy depths. Through sheer determination, you locate: {item}!
Black Labyrinth 0.alreadyCheckedMessage: The shadows of this labyrinth section hold no more surprises for you.
Black Labyrinth 0.inaccessibleMessage: Impenetrable darkness bars your entry to the Black Labyrinth.

White Castle Basement.checkMessage: In the depths beneath the White Castle, you search through ancient storage chambers and dusty alcoves. Your investigation reveals: {item}!
White Castle Basement.alreadyCheckedMessage: You've already scoured every corner of the White Castle's basement.
White Castle Basement.inaccessibleMessage: The basement entrance is sealed with protective wards.

Black Castle Basement.checkMessage: The cursed basement of the Black Castle fills you with dread, but you steel yourself and continue searching. Among the shadows, you discover: {item}!
Black Castle Basement.alreadyCheckedMessage: This accursed basement has already given up its dark secrets to you.
Black Castle Basement.inaccessibleMessage: Malevolent forces prevent you from entering the Black Castle's basement.

Yellow Castle Basement.checkMessage: Golden light illuminates the Yellow Castle's treasure-filled basement as you explore. Your careful search uncovers: {item}!
Yellow Castle Basement.alreadyCheckedMessage: The golden basement's riches have already been claimed by you.
Yellow Castle Basement.inaccessibleMessage: The basement is locked behind golden gates that refuse to open.

GameStart.moveMessage: You take your first brave steps into the world of Adventure, leaving the safety of the starting point behind. The journey of a lifetime begins now...
GameStart.inaccessibleMessage: An invisible barrier prevents you from beginning your adventure. Perhaps you need to prepare further.

To White Castle.moveMessage: You follow the well-trodden path toward the White Castle, its gleaming spires growing larger with each step.
To White Castle.inaccessibleMessage: The road to the White Castle is blocked by fallen trees and debris.

To Black Castle.moveMessage: You venture down the ominous path leading to the Black Castle, shadows growing deeper as you approach.
To Black Castle.inaccessibleMessage: Dark magic bars your passage to the Black Castle.

To Yellow Castle.moveMessage: You stride confidently toward the Yellow Castle, drawn by the promise of golden treasures within.
To Yellow Castle.inaccessibleMessage: The path to the Yellow Castle is obstructed by a wall of golden light.

Enter Blue Labyrinth.moveMessage: You steel yourself and step into the Blue Labyrinth, ready to face whatever challenges await in its azure corridors.
Enter Blue Labyrinth.inaccessibleMessage: The Blue Labyrinth's entrance is sealed by ancient magic.

Enter Yellow Labyrinth.moveMessage: The golden glow of the Yellow Labyrinth beckons as you cross its threshold, prepared for the maze ahead.
Enter Yellow Labyrinth.inaccessibleMessage: Golden barriers prevent your entry into the Yellow Labyrinth.

Enter Black Labyrinth.moveMessage: With courage in your heart, you plunge into the darkness of the Black Labyrinth, determined to conquer its shadows.
Enter Black Labyrinth.inaccessibleMessage: The Black Labyrinth is shrouded in impenetrable darkness.

Return to Overworld.moveMessage: You emerge back into the familiar expanse of the Overworld, breathing deeply of the open air.
Return to Overworld.inaccessibleMessage: Something prevents you from leaving this place.

Sword.foundMessage: The legendary Sword gleams in your hands, its blade humming with ancient power!
Sword.description: A weapon of heroes, capable of vanquishing any evil.

Key.foundMessage: You grasp the mystical Key, feeling its magical properties resonate through your being!
Key.description: An ornate key that can unlock the most secure of barriers.

Chalice.foundMessage: The sacred Chalice radiates divine light as you lift it reverently!
Chalice.description: A holy vessel said to bring protection to its bearer.

Left Difficulty Switch.foundMessage: You discover the Left Difficulty Switch, a mysterious artifact that seems to control the very nature of reality!
Left Difficulty Switch.description: An enigmatic device that can alter the challenges you face.

Right Difficulty Switch.foundMessage: The Right Difficulty Switch pulses with otherworldly energy as you claim it!
Right Difficulty Switch.description: A companion to its left counterpart, holding equal mysterious power.
